changeSet.createView: SELECT a.ID,a.FROZEN_BOX_CODE, (a.EQUIPMENT_CODE||'.'||a.AREA_CODE||'.'||a.SUPPORT_RACK_CODE || '.'||a.ROWS_IN_SHELF ||'.'||a.COLUMNS_IN_SHELF) as position, s.SAMPLE_TYPE_NAME,sc.SAMPLE_CLASSIFICATION_NAME ,f.IS_SPLIT , a.STATUS,a.COUNT_OF_SAMPLE,a.STOCK_IN_CODE FROM STOCK_IN_BOX a LEFT JOIN FROZEN_BOX f on a.FROZEN_BOX_ID=f.ID LEFT JOIN SAMPLE_TYPE s on f.SAMPLE_TYPE_ID=s.ID LEFT JOIN SAMPLE_CLASS sc on f.SAMPLE_CLASSIFICATION_ID=sc.ID
